name: My first month in London.
description:
My time in London

How to play?

  • use WASD to walk around.
  • Talk to every character you come across to get more information.
  • Collect the keys, cups of tea, and story hearts. As each of these will give you some information.

What is the game about?

  • This game is the first episode in the series. 
  • It tells you about my first month in London.
  •  There will be future episodes about my time in London.
  • Please leave a comment if you would like to experience my time in London through my bitsy games.
  • I have used different  colors for the environment and different tile shapes  based on my emotions at that specific moment in my life. 

Specifics for those interested.

  1. Each room corresponds to my emotions at that time.
  2. Light colors and "+" symbols on the walls means a safe room or a happy feeling.
  3. Dark rooms with "-" or negative symbols on the walls relates to me being scared and lost.
  4. Some rooms might have mixed symbols which means I my emotional state was "confusion".
